rukus.text: Qul Ya 'Ayyuha An-Nasu 'Innama 'Ana Lakum Nadhirun Mubinun
Fa-Al-Ladhina 'Amanu Wa `Amilu As-Salihati Lahum Maghfiratun Wa Rizqun Karimun
Wa Al-Ladhina Sa`aw Fi 'Ayatina Mu`ajizina 'Ula'ika 'Ashabu Al-Jahimi

Wa Ma 'Arsalna Min Qablika Min Rasulin Wa La Nabiyin 'Illa 'Idha Tamanna 'Alqa Ash-Shaytanu Fi 'Umniyatihi Fayansakhu Allahu Ma Yulqi Ash-Shaytanu Thumma Yuhkimu Allahu 'Ayatihi Wa Allahu `Alimun Hakimun
Liyaj`ala Ma Yulqi Ash-Shaytanu Fitnatan Lilladhina Fi Qulubihim MaraÄ‘un Wa Al-Qasiyati Qulubuhum Wa 'Inna Az-Zalimina Lafi Shiqaqin Ba`idin
Wa Liya`lama Al-Ladhina 'Utu Al-`Ilma 'Annahu Al-Haqqu Min Rabbika Fayu'uminu Bihi Fatukhbita Lahu Qulubuhum Wa 'Inna Allaha Lahadi Al-Ladhina 'Amanu 'Ila Siratin Mustaqimin
Wa La Yazalu Al-Ladhina Kafaru Fi Miryatin Minhu Hatta Ta'tiyahumu As-Sa`atu Baghtatan 'Aw Ya'tiyahum `Adhabu Yawmin `Aqimin
Al-Mulku Yawma'idhin Lillahi Yahkumu Baynahum Fa-Al-Ladhina 'Amanu Wa `Amilu As-Salihati Fi Jannati An-Na`imi
Wa Al-Ladhina Kafaru Wa Kadhabu Bi'ayatina Fa'ula'ika Lahum `Adhabun Muhinun
